subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Thor Hushovd, who wore the yellow jersey for most of the first week of the Tour de France, then lost it, barreled down a mountain pass to win Stage 13.
snippet: Thor Hushovd, who wore the yellow jersey for most of the first week of the Tour de France, then lost it, barreled down a mountain pass to win Stage 13.
